title: introduction to aws sagemaker
description:
This course provides a foundational understanding of AWS SageMaker, a powerful tool for building, training, and deploying machine learning models at scale. Participants will explore the various features and functionalities of SageMaker, including data preparation, model training, and deployment processes. Through hands-on exercises and real-world examples, learners will gain practical experience in utilizing SageMaker to streamline their machine learning workflows and enhance their capabilities as aspiring machine learning engineers.

As the demand for machine learning solutions continues to grow, understanding cloud-based platforms like AWS SageMaker is essential for anyone looking to enter the field. This course will cover key concepts such as SageMaker Studio, built-in algorithms, and integration with other AWS services. By the end of the course, participants will be equipped with the skills necessary to leverage SageMaker for their own machine learning projects, making it an invaluable resource for beginners eager to embark on their machine learning journey.
target_audience: This course is designed for beginners who are interested in machine learning and want to learn how to use AWS SageMaker to build and deploy machine learning models. It is suitable for individuals with little to no prior experience in machine learning or cloud computing, including students, professionals transitioning into data science, and anyone looking to enhance their technical skills in the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence.
learning_objectives: Understand the core concepts and components of AWS SageMaker.
Demonstrate the ability to prepare data for machine learning using SageMaker.
Train machine learning models using built-in algorithms and custom code.
Evaluate model performance and make necessary adjustments.
Deploy machine learning models to production environments using SageMaker.
Integrate SageMaker with other AWS services to enhance machine learning workflows.
Gain hands-on experience through practical exercises and projects.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of machine learning concepts.
Basic knowledge of AWS services is beneficial but not required.

metadata.course_focus: Introduction to AWS SageMaker, machine learning model training and deployment, data preparation, integration with AWS services.
